column4: Traffic;Siem Reap: ------ An young American fell from a tuk tuk inTa Phul Village
column5: Svay Dangkum Commune – Siem Reap on December 27
column6: 2018.------The tuk tuk driver turned too quickly into a car
column7: and the girl fell on impact
column8: causing head injuries.------ She was taken away by ambulance for treatment in a clinic.------Images:------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/281572
